metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34432 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability was found in sox, in the lsx_readbuf function at sox/src/formats_i.c:98:16. This flaw can lead to a denial of service, code execution, or information disclosure.

notes.Note: allenpthuang> Same fix as the one for CVE-2021-23159.

criterions.comment: sox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
